title: Sarah Langa blasts Twitter: Don't tell me what race category I fall under
text:
South African film costing just R20‚000 to make wins SciFi award for best cast 
Initially the twar started when Sarah said she hates the concept of 'slay' 
"I hate this "slaying" concept! It makes us believe that to feel worthy u must be better than every1 else, even it it means bringing ppl dwn." 
Then these people had something to say. @angryblackhoemo @afrokai @sarahlanga She Black, which makes this all kinds of fucked up still — Black. Queer. God. (@AdamantxYves) February 22, 2017 Sarah was not impressed and she came for them. Hard. I dont knw where ppl get the right to be labeling other people black, white or coloured. It's none of ur business boo! And anyway who cares? — Sarah Langa Mackay (@sarahlanga) February 22, 2017 The debate has seen Sarah make it to the Twitter trends list with tweeps deciphering her race. "There is no racial catagory for us and that's exactly my point, I can't have ppl that know nothing about my race tell me what I am," replied Sarah to one person.

Since you guys are so smart, tell me what race am I? Or should I host a meet and greet so that you can all stick pencils in my hair? — Sarah Langa Mackay (@sarahlanga) February 22, 2017 Share
